mapper.select: select id, created_at, created_by, updated_at, updated_by, deleted_at, sort, stable, status, memo, parent_code, name, path, component, redirect, title, icon, hidden, keep_alive, is_link from sys_menu where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_menu(created_at, created_by, updated_at, updated_by, deleted_at, sort, stable, status, memo, parent_code, name, path, component, redirect, title, icon, hidden, keep_alive, is_link) values (#{createdAt}, #{createdBy}, #{updatedAt}, #{updatedBy}, #{deletedAt}, #{sort}, #{stable}, #{status}, #{memo}, #{parentCode}, #{name}, #{path}, #{component}, #{redirect}, #{title}, #{icon}, #{hidden}, #{keepAlive}, #{isLink})

insert into sys_menu(created_at, created_by, updated_at, updated_by, deleted_at, sort, stable, status, memo, parent_code, name, path, component, redirect, title, icon, hidden, keep_alive, is_link) values
(#{entity.createdAt}, #{entity.createdBy}, #{entity.updatedAt}, #{entity.updatedBy}, #{entity.deletedAt}, #{entity.sort}, #{entity.stable}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.memo}, #{entity.parentCode}, #{entity.name}, #{entity.path}, #{entity.component}, #{entity.redirect}, #{entity.title}, #{entity.icon}, #{entity.hidden}, #{entity.keepAlive}, #{entity.isLink})

insert into sys_menu(created_at, created_by, updated_at, updated_by, deleted_at, sort, stable, status, memo, parent_code, name, path, component, redirect, title, icon, hidden, keep_alive, is_link) values
(#{entity.createdAt}, #{entity.createdBy}, #{entity.updatedAt}, #{entity.updatedBy}, #{entity.deletedAt}, #{entity.sort}, #{entity.stable}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.memo}, #{entity.parentCode}, #{entity.name}, #{entity.path}, #{entity.component}, #{entity.redirect}, #{entity.title}, #{entity.icon}, #{entity.hidden}, #{entity.keepAlive}, #{entity.isLink})
on duplicate key update created_at = values(created_at), created_by = values(created_by), updated_at = values(updated_at), updated_by = values(updated_by), deleted_at = values(deleted_at), sort = values(sort), stable = values(stable), status = values(status), memo = values(memo), parent_code = values(parent_code), name = values(name), path = values(path), component = values(component), redirect = values(redirect), title = values(title), icon = values(icon), hidden = values(hidden), keep_alive = values(keep_alive), is_link = values(is_link)
mapper.update:
update sys_menu
created_at = #{createdAt},
created_by = #{createdBy},
updated_at = #{updatedAt},
updated_by = #{updatedBy},
deleted_at = #{deletedAt},
sort = #{sort},
stable = #{stable},
status = #{status},
memo = #{memo},
parent_code = #{parentCode},
name = #{name},
path = #{path},
component = #{component},
redirect = #{redirect},
title = #{title},
icon = #{icon},
hidden = #{hidden},
keep_alive = #{keepAlive},
is_link = #{isLink},
where id = #{id}
